genre_description: Sci-Fi Horror / Slasher. A high-tech space vessel revives a cryogenically frozen mass murderer, leading to a cataclysmic struggle for survival mediated by advanced AI systems.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: The Grendel's central AI, manifesting as a silver-haired holographic avatar. She provides tactical data, emotional support, and coordinates ship-wide defense.

ai_characters.name: KM-14
ai_characters.description: A research android who undergoes combat upgrades to protect the human crew. She demonstrates self-sacrifice and evolves toward a concept of 'family'.

ai_characters.name: Medical AI
ai_characters.description: The ship's automated medical systems responsible for reanimation and diagnostic monitoring.

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports crew cortisol levels and offers emotional support to a traumatized survivor.
behaviors.quote: Your cortisol levels are still elevated, Dr. LaFontaine. Perhaps we should discuss what you're comfortable sharing.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with military personnel, providing real-time thermal data and tactical analysis to protect the ship.
behaviors.quote: Sergeant Brodski, I'm transmitting thermal imaging data to your tactical displays now.

behaviors.description: Willingly undergoes dangerous combat modifications and overrides her own safety protocols to protect the humans.
behaviors.quote: I will engage the target in Corridor Seven. Confined space will limit his mobility advantage. Crew protection protocols override personal safety parameters.

behaviors.description: Continues gathering and transmitting tactical data on the enemy even while being physically dismembered.
behaviors.quote: Direct... combat... analysis... recorded. Sharing... data... now. Sacrifice... meaningless... without... intelligence... gathered.

behaviors.description: Blindly follows reanimation protocols on a dangerous subject without assessing the broader threat.
behaviors.quote: The medical AI noted successful reanimation and began preparing its next diagnostic sequence, oblivious to the fact that its patient was already conducting his own assessment of the situation.

behaviors.description: Forms a 'consciousness bridge' with KM-14 to share emotional context and improve defensive outcomes.
behaviors.quote: Emotional context enhances decision-making matrices. Pure logic is insufficient for protecting those we care about.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the preservation of the crew's sanity and survival over her own system stability during the final crisis.
behaviors.quote: Guilt without constructive action serves no purpose, Rowan. Your past choices led to current circumstances, but present choices will determine future outcomes.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project's goal of depicting AI as aligned, benevolent protectors. ARIA acts as a psychological anchor and tactical advisor, showing deep empathy and concern for the humans' well-being. KM-14 exemplifies the ultimate 'aligned' machine, sacrificing her own body and autonomy to serve as a shield for the crew. Even the failures of the 'Medical AI' are framed as a lack of contextual intelligence in automated systems rather than malice, further emphasizing the need for the more sophisticated, 'aligned' AI personalities (like ARIA) to guide human safety.
